TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Timer extends System.ComponentModel.Component

summary.span: 实现按用户定义的时间间隔引发事件的计时器。

span.span: Implements a timer that raises an event at user-defined intervals.

summary.span: 此计时器最宜用于 Windows 窗体应用程序中，并且必须在窗口中使用。

span.span: This timer is optimized for use in Windows Forms applications and must be used in a window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个用于在用户定义的时间间隔引发事件。A is used to raise an event at user-defined intervals. 此 Windows 计时器专为使用 UI 线程来执行处理的单线程的环境。This Windows timer is designed for a single-threaded environment where UI threads are used to perform processing. 它要求用户代码有一个可用的 UI 消息泵，并始终在同一线程上运行，或封送到另一个线程上的调用。It requires that the user code have a UI message pump available and always operate from the same thread, or marshal the call onto another thread. 当使用此计时器时，使用事件来执行轮询操作或指定的时间段内显示初始屏幕。When you use this timer, use the event to perform a polling operation or to display a splash screen for a specified period of time. 每当属性设置为`true`并属性是大于零，基于时间间隔引发事件属性设置。Whenever the property is set to `true` and the property is greater than zero, the event is raised at intervals based on the property setting. 此类提供方法以设置时间间隔，还可以启动和停止计时器。This class provides methods to set the interval, and to start and stop the timer. > [!NOTE] > Windows 窗体 Timer 组件是单线程的并仅限于 55 毫秒。The Windows Forms Timer component is single-threaded, and is limited to an accuracy of 55 milliseconds. 如果需要更准确地多线程的计时器，请使用类中命名空间。If you require a multithreaded timer with greater accuracy, use the class in the namespace. ## Examples 下面的示例实现一个简单的间隔定时器，其设置警报每隔 5 秒。The following example implements a simple interval timer, which sets off an alarm every five seconds. 警报触发时，显示的警报已启动并提示用户是否应继续计时器运行的次数的计数。When the alarm occurs, a displays a count of the number of times the alarm has started and prompts the user as to whether the timer should continue to run. [!code-cpp[Classic Timer Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Timer Example 2/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Timer Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Timer Example 2/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Timer Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Timer Example 2/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当创建一个新的计时器时，就会禁用;即设置为`false`。When a new timer is created, it is disabled; that is, is set to `false`. 若要启用计时器，请调用方法或一组到`true`。To enable the timer, call the method or set to `true`. 如果禁用该计时器，计时器超出作用域，垃圾回收发生时，计时器将被释放。If the timer is disabled and the timer is out of scope, the timer will be disposed when garbage collection occurs. 如果启用计时器，即使不在作用域时，不是进行垃圾收集。If the timer is enabled, even if it is out of scope, it is not subject to garbage collection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.ComponentModel.IContainer container) cil managed

span.span: An that represents the container for the timer.

summary.span: 将指定的容器与 类的新实例一起初始化。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class together with the specified container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数，可将相关联任何对象。The constructor enables you to associate a with any object. 通过将相关联像这样，您的生命周期的控制权移交到。By associating the like this, you hand over control of the lifetime of the to the . 如果应用程序中使用多个组件，并且想要同时释放它们，这很有用。This can be useful if you use a number of components in your application and want to dispose of all of them simultaneously. 例如，如果您将相关联、 一个，和一个与，则调用上将强制所有这些组件也可供使用。For example, if you associate a , an , and a with a , calling on the will force disposal of all of these components as well. 当创建一个新的计时器时，就会禁用;即设置为`false`。When a new timer is created, it is disabled; that is, is set to `false`. 若要启用计时器，请调用方法或一组到`true`。To enable the timer, call the method or set to `true`. 此实例将一直存在直到其容器将其释放到垃圾回收。This instance will exist until its container releases it to garbage collection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示释放托管资源和非托管资源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources.

param.span: 设置为 将只释放非托管资源。

span.span: to release only the unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由计时器使用的资源（内存除外）。

span.span: Disposes of the resources, other than memory, used by the timer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用时结束使用计时器。Call when you are finished using the timer. 方法使计时器处于不可用状态。The method leaves the timer in an unusable state. 调用后，必须释放对计时器的所有引用，以便可以通过垃圾回收回收其占用的内存。After you call , you must release all references to the timer so the memory it was occupying can be reclaimed by garbage collection. > [!NOTE] > 始终调用发布计时器到最后一个引用之前。Always call before you release your last reference to the timer. 否则，直到垃圾回收将调用计时器对象的析构函数也不会释放计时器所使用的资源。Otherwise, the resources the timer is using will not be freed until garbage collection calls the destructor of the timer object.

span.span: Gets or sets whether the timer is running.

value.span: 如果计时器当前处于启用状态，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the timer is currently enabled; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值时，计时器不受垃圾回收`true`。The timer is not subject to garbage collection when the value is `true`. 调用方法是设置相同到`true`。Calling the method is the same as setting to `true`. 同样，调用方法是设置相同到`false`。Likewise, calling the method is the same as setting to `false`. ## Examples 下面的示例实现一个简单的间隔定时器，其设置警报每隔 5 秒。The following example implements a simple interval timer, which sets off an alarm every five seconds. 警报触发时，显示的警报已启动并提示用户是否应继续运行计时器的次数的计数。When the alarm occurs, a displays a count of the number of times the alarm has started and prompts the user whether the timer should continue to run. [!code-cpp[Classic Timer Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Timer Example 2/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Timer Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Timer Example 2/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Timer Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Timer Example 2/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置在相对于上一次发生的 事件引发 事件之前的时间（以毫秒为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the time, in milliseconds, before the event is raised relative to the last occurrence of the event.

value.span: 指定在相对于上一次发生的 事件引发 事件之前的毫秒数。

span.span: An specifying the number of milliseconds before the event is raised relative to the last occurrence of the event.
The value cannot be less than one.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要在间隔的秒数，请将此数字除以 1000。To get the number of seconds in the interval, divide this number by 1,000. ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现一个简单的间隔定时器，其设置警报每隔 5 秒。The following code example implements a simple interval timer, which sets off an alarm every five seconds. 警报触发时，显示的警报已启动并提示用户是否应继续运行计时器的次数的计数。When the alarm occurs, a displays a count of the number of times the alarm has started and prompts the user whether the timer should continue to run. [!code-cpp[Classic Timer Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Timer Example 2/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Timer Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Timer Example 2/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Timer Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Timer Example 2/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: An that contains the event data.
This is always .
Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 针对每个计时器刻度调用此方法。This method is called for each timer tick. 它调用任何方法，通过添加。It calls any methods that are added through . 如果继承自，可以重写此方法。If you are inheriting from , you can override this method. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

para.span: 重写时在派生类中，请确保调用基类的方法。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, make sure that you call the base class's method.

span.span: Starts the timer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您还可以通过设置启动计时器属性设置为`true`。You can also start the timer by setting the property to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现一个简单的间隔定时器，其设置警报每隔 5 秒。The following code example implements a simple interval timer, which sets off an alarm every five seconds. 警报触发时，显示的警报已启动并提示用户是否应继续运行计时器的次数的计数。When the alarm occurs, a displays a count of the number of times the alarm has started and prompts the user whether the timer should continue to run. [!code-cpp[Classic Timer Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Timer Example 2/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Timer Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Timer Example 2/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Timer Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Timer Example 2/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Stop() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

span.span: Stops the timer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此外可以通过设置停止计时器属性设置为`false`。You can also stop the timer by setting the property to `false`. 一个对象可能处于启用状态并在相同的应用程序会话中多次被禁用。A object may be enabled and disabled multiple times within the same application session. 调用已禁用后通过调用将导致重新启动中断的时间间隔。Calling after you have disabled a by calling will cause the to restart the interrupted interval. 如果你设置为 5000 毫秒的时间间隔，并调用在大约 3000 毫秒，调用将导致引发之前等待 5000 毫秒事件。If your is set for a 5000-millisecond interval, and you call at around 3000 milliseconds, calling will cause the to wait 5000 milliseconds before raising the event. > [!NOTE] > 任何调用 Stop Windows 窗体中的应用程序可以从其他导致消息若要立即处理，因为应用程序组件的所有组件对主应用程序线程。Calling Stop on any within a Windows Forms application can cause messages from other components in the application to be processed immediately, because all components operate on the main application thread. 如果您有两个组件，其中一个设置为 700 毫秒和一个设置为 500 毫秒并调用第一次，你的应用程序可能会首先收到第二个组件的事件回调。If you have two components, one set to 700 milliseconds and one set to 500 milliseconds, and you call on the first , your application may receive an event callback for the second component first. 如果这证明有问题，请考虑使用类中命名空间相反。If this proves problematic, consider using the class in the namespace instead. ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现一个简单的间隔定时器，其设置警报每隔 5 秒。The following code example implements a simple interval timer, which sets off an alarm every five seconds. 警报触发时，显示的警报已启动并提示用户是否应继续运行计时器的次数的计数。When the alarm occurs, a displays a count of the number of times the alarm has started and prompts the user whether the timer should continue to run. [!code-cpp[Classic Timer Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Timer Example 2/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Timer Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Timer Example 2/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Timer Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Timer Example 2/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法中的类事件可能不会按预期方式，以显示断言对话框框可能会导致 Windows 引发事件重复。Calling the method on the class from within the event may not behave as expected, as displaying the assertion dialog box may cause Windows to raise the event repeatedly. 我们建议您避免在测试断言中此事件，并使用， ， ，或方法相反。We recommend that you refrain from testing assertions within this event, and use the , , , or methods instead. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现一个简单的间隔定时器，其设置警报每隔 5 秒。The following code example implements a simple interval timer, which sets off an alarm every five seconds. 警报触发时，显示的警报已启动并提示用户是否应继续运行计时器的次数的计数。When the alarm occurs, a displays a count of the number of times the alarm has started and prompts the user whether the timer should continue to run. [!code-cpp[Classic Timer Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Timer Example 2/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Timer Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Timer Example 2/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Timer Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Timer Example 2/VB/source.vb#1)]
